languages.text: "Если бы я совал нос в прошлое каждого из сотен людей в команде, я бы не успевал вашим судном управлять. Я только знаю, что, когда на Райкад Минорис все завертелось, этот вот организовал работу в доках так, что дурачье в панике друг друга не передавило. А потом на Футфоле нашел знакомца в порту, и нам кое-какие детали за сутки отыскали. Еще и руки из правильного места растут. Может, и до младшего кормчего дослужится, если и дальше так пойдет".

traits.locale_text: "Я в чужое прошлое нос не сую. Я, Лорд-капитан, по делам сужу. На Райкад Минорис он в порту эвакуацию рабочих организовал. Иначе так бы дурачье там и сгинуло. Другой раз, на Футфоле, уж не знаю, с кем он договорился, но обшивку нам залатали вне очереди, еще и натерли чем-то — аж блестела. Да и руки из правильного места растут. Так бы и до младшего кормчего дослужился".

languages.text: "If I went sticking my beak into the pasts of every one of the hundreds of people in the crew, I wouldn't have time to steer your ship. All I know is that when everything went to groxshit on Rykad Minoris, this one oversaw the work at the docks so that the fools didn't trample each other to death in their panic. And later he ran into a friend at the port on Footfall, and they found us some parts within a day. He's even got arms growing out of the right places. He might make it to junior helmsman, if he keeps it up."
languages.original_text: "Если бы я совал нос в прошлое каждого из сотен людей в команде, я бы не успевал вашим судном управлять. Я только знаю, что, когда на Райкад Минорис все завертелось, этот вот организовал работу в доках так, что дурачье в панике друг друга не передавило. languages.text: 「数百人のクルーのそれぞれの過去をほじくり返してたら、あなたの船を操縦する時間なんてなくなりますよ。私が知ってるのは、ライカド・ミノリスで全部が蜥蜴牛のクソまみれになったとき、こいつがドックの作業を取り仕切ってくれたおかげで、馬鹿な奴らがパニックになって互いに踏み潰し合わずに済んだってことだけです。しかもその後、彼はフットフォールの港で旧友にばったり会って、必要な部品を一日で調達してきました。腕もちゃんと生えるべき場所から生えますしね。調子を保てば、下級操舵手くらいにはなれるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "If I went sticking my beak into the pasts of every one of the hundreds of people in the crew, I wouldn't have time to steer your ship. All I know is that when everything went to groxshit on Rykad Minoris, this one oversaw the work at the docks so that the fools didn't trample each other to death in their panic. And later he ran into a friend at the port on Footfall, and they found us some parts within a day. He's even got arms growing out of the right places. He might make it to junior helmsman, if he keeps it up."

languages.text: "Mürettebattaki yüzlerce insanın her birinin geçmişini inceleyecek olsaydım geminizi idare etmeye vaktim kalmazdı. Bildiğim bir şey varsa o da Rykad Minoris'te işler sarpa sardığında diğer aptalların panik hâliyle birbirlerini ezip öldürmemesi için rıhtımdaki işleri bu adamın yönettiğidir. Daha sonradan da Binliman'daki rıhtımda bir arkadaşına rastlamış ve birlikte daha bir gün geçmeden bize bazı parçalar bulmuşlardı. Bakacak olursanız eli yüzü de düzgün sayılır. Böyle devam ederse ast serdümen bile olabilir."
languages.original_text: "If I went sticking my beak into the pasts of every one of the hundreds of people in the crew, I wouldn't have time to steer your ship. All I know is that when everything went to groxshit on Rykad Minoris, this one oversaw the work at the docks so that the fools didn't trample each other to death in their panic. And later he ran into a friend at the port on Footfall, and they found us some parts within a day. He's even got arms growing out of the right places. He might make it to junior helmsman, if he keeps it up."

traits.locale_text: "Mürettebattaki yüzlerce insanın her birinin geçmişini inceleyecek olsaydım geminizi yönetmeye vaktim kalmazdı. Bildiğim bir şey varsa o da Rykad Minoris'te işler sarpa sardığında diğer aptalların panik hâliyle birbirlerini ezip öldürmemesi için rıhtımdaki işleri bu adamın yönettiğidir. Daha sonradan da Binliman'daki rıhtımda bir arkadaşına rastlıyor ve birlikte daha bir gün geçmeden bize bazı parçalar buluyorlar. Bakacak olursanız eli yüzü de düzgün sayılır. Böyle devam ederse ast serdümen bile olabilir."

languages.text: «Si empezara a husmear en el pasado de cada uno de nuestros cientos de tripulantes, no tendría tiempo de pilotar su nave. Lo que sé es que cuando todo se fue a la mierda de grox en Rykad Minoris, este hombre supervisó las tareas en el puerto para que la gente no muriera pisoteada. Y, más adelante, se encontró con un amigo en el puerto de Paso y nos consiguieron piezas que necesitábamos en menos de un día. Hasta tiene todas las extremidades donde corresponde. Si sigue así, podría llegar a timonel de segunda».
languages.original_text: "If I went sticking my beak into the pasts of every one of the hundreds of people in the crew, I wouldn't have time to steer your ship. All I know is that when everything went to groxshit on Rykad Minoris, this one oversaw the work at the docks so that the fools didn't trample each other to death in their panic. And later he ran into a friend at the port on Footfall, and they found us some parts within a day. He's even got arms growing out of the right places. He might make it to junior helmsman, if he keeps it up."

traits.locale_text: «Si empezara a husmear en el pasado de cada uno de nuestros cientos de tripulantes, no tendría tiempo de pilotar su nave. Lo que sé es que cuando todo se fue a la mierda de grox en Rykad Minoris, este hombre supervisó las tareas en el puerto para que la gente no muriera pisoteada. Y, más adelante, se encontró con un amigo en el puerto de Paso y nos consiguieron piezas que necesitábamos en menos de un día. Hasta tiene todas las extremidades donde corresponde. Si sigue así, podría llegar a timonel de segunda».

languages.text: “我手下有几百号人，如果这些人以前的事情我挨个查一遍，恐怕就没时间给你开船了。我只知道，当时小莱卡德变得像格洛克斯兽的臭屎一样，而这个人负责监督码头的工作，让那些蠢货不至于在恐慌中互相踩踏致死。再后来，他在落脚港找到了他的朋友，而他那个朋友一天之内就找到了我们需要的零件。更重要的是，这个人甚至也没多长出来几条胳膊什么的。只要他能坚持下去的话，说不定能晋升成为初级舵手呢。”
languages.original_text: "If I went sticking my beak into the pasts of every one of the hundreds of people in the crew, I wouldn't have time to steer your ship. All I know is that when everything went to groxshit on Rykad Minoris, this one oversaw the work at the docks so that the fools didn't trample each other to death in their panic. And later he ran into a friend at the port on Footfall, and they found us some parts within a day. He's even got arms growing out of the right places. He might make it to junior helmsman, if he keeps it up."

traits.locale_text: “我手下有几百号人，如果这些人以前的事情我挨个查一遍，恐怕就没时间给你开船了。我只知道，当时小莱卡德变得像格洛克斯兽的臭屎一样，而这个人负责监督码头的工作，让那些蠢货不至于在恐慌中互相踩踏致死。再后来，他在落脚港找到了他的朋友，而他那个朋友一天之内就找到了我们需要的零件。更重要的是，这个人甚至也没多长出来几条胳膊什么的。只要他能坚持下去的话，说不定能晋升成为初级舵手呢。”

languages.text: « Si je devais fourrer mon nez dans le passé des centaines de personnes qui composent l'équipage, je n'aurais plus le temps de manœuvrer ce vaisseau. Tout ce que je sais, c'est que quand tout a tourné au vinaigre sur Rykad Minoris, c'est cet homme qui a supervisé les quais pour éviter les mouvements de panique de la foule. Et plus tard, il a contacté l'un de ses amis de Castel qui nous a trouvé des pièces de rechange dans la journée. Il ne manque pas de ressources. Il pourrait bien devenir timonier en second, s'il continue comme ça. »
languages.original_text: "If I went sticking my beak into the pasts of every one of the hundreds of people in the crew, I wouldn't have time to steer your ship. All I know is that when everything went to groxshit on Rykad Minoris, this one oversaw the work at the docks so that the fools didn't trample each other to death in their panic. And later he ran into a friend at the port on Footfall, and they found us some parts within a day. He's even got arms growing out of the right places. He might make it to junior helmsman, if he keeps it up."

traits.locale_text: « Si je devais fourrer mon nez dans le passé des centaines de personnes qui composent l'équipage, je n'aurais plus le temps de manœuvrer ce vaisseau. Tout ce que je sais, c'est que quand tout a tourné au vinaigre sur Rykad Minoris, c'est cet homme qui a supervisé les quais pour éviter les mouvements de panique de la foule. Et plus tard, il a contacté l'un de ses amis de Castel qui nous a trouvé des pièces de rechange dans la journée. Il ne manque pas de ressources. Il pourrait bien devenir timonier en second, s'il continue comme ça. »

languages.text: "Würde ich in der Vergangenheit von Hunderten von Besatzungsmitgliedern herumschnüffeln, bliebe mir keine Zeit, Euer Schiff zu steuern. Ich weiß nur, als auf Rykad Minoris alles den Bach runterging, hat dieser Mann in den Docks dafür gesorgt, dass sich all die Idioten in ihrer Panik nicht gegenseitig totgetrampelt haben. Später hat er gemeinsam mit einem Freund im Hafen von Footfall innerhalb eines Tages einige Teile für uns beschafft. Er hat sogar Arme an den richtigen Stellen. Wenn er so weitermacht, könnte er zweiter Steuermann werden."
languages.original_text: "If I went sticking my beak into the pasts of every one of the hundreds of people in the crew, I wouldn't have time to steer your ship. All I know is that when everything went to groxshit on Rykad Minoris, this one oversaw the work at the docks so that the fools didn't trample each other to death in their panic. And later he ran into a friend at the port on Footfall, and they found us some parts within a day. He's even got arms growing out of the right places. He might make it to junior helmsman, if he keeps it up."
